opendial.bn.distribs.densityfunctions

Class UniformDensityFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.bn.distribs.densityfunctions.UniformDensityFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DensityFunction

    public class UniformDensityFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements DensityFunction
    (Univariate) uniform density function, with a minimum and maximum.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-10-28 19:58:54 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
